text: Lisieux is a commune. It is found in the Normandy region in the Calvados department in the northwest of France. Death place of St. Therese of Lisieux (Sainte Thérèse de l'Enfant Jésus), who entered the Carmelite convent at the age of 15. ==Other websites== Category:Communes in Calvados Category:Subprefectures in France
title: Lisieux
